glossentry.glossdef:
There are various cases where a component is made available by a provider under multiple associated licenses. The effective licenses are the selected licenses relevant for the software distribution:
A component is provided with a dual or multiple licensing option where either one or the other license can be used for distribution. In this case a single effective license needs to be determined.
A component is provided with a license in a specific or later version. In this case a version of the license has to be selected as effective license.
For a component, which contains subcomponents the license of the component and the individual licenses of the subcomponents are effective.
The associated license of a component allows to sublicense the component under a different license. In this case the chosen license is the effective license.
